      • generateAllCombinations

        public static java.util.List<MixedParameterList> generateAllCombinations(java.util.List<UniqueParameterList<?>> lists)
        The method returns a list that contains all combinations of of the given lists, with at most one element of each list is contained in the resulting set. The indices of the resulting MixedParameterList is preserved.

        An Example:

        S0 = {A,B,C}, |S0| = 3 S1 = {D,E} , |S1| = 2 S2 = {A,E} , |S2| = 2 S = { S0, S1, S2 } m = |S0| * |S1| * |S0| = 3 * 2 * 2 = 12 combinations

        Combinations: [A, D, A] [A, D, E] [A, E, A] [A, E, E] [B, D, A] [B, D, E] [B, E, A] [B, E, E] [C, D, A] [C, D, E] [C, E, A] [C, E, E]

        Parameters:
        lists - The lists.
        Returns:
        The combinations of the lists.
